edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.vacation

Class Tour

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.vacation.Tour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tour>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EducationalTrip, LandTour, RiverCruise

    public abstract class Tour
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Tour>
    Tour abstract class which is extended by 3 subclasses : EducationalTrip, LandTour, and RiverCruise classes.
    Author:
    dkudo

      • createReservationFor

        public Reservation createReservationFor(Client c,
                                        int i)
                                 throws CapacityException
        Create new reservations of the given number of party including a given Client
        Parameters:
        c - : Client who reserved this Tour
        i - : number of parties including the Client
        Returns:
        : Reservation object which is by the party
        Throws:
        CapacityException - : if the tour cannot accommodate the number of people in the reservation party
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - : if any of parameters is invalid.
